name: Lift
overview: Another cute mini-game from Japanese dev Inufuto released on 12.25.2021! This game may look simple to the eye, but it's extremely addictive and fun! It's a bit of a mash-up between a puzzler version of Elevator Action and Capture the Flag! To maximize scoring, pick up consecutive color flags! Inufutu posts all of his games on approximately 27 different retro computer formats, including most Japanese 8-bit computers, as well as Western systems such as the C64, VIC-20, and the ZX Spectrum.
